Celestial Object.Name: GRS 1758-258
Celestial Object.Time: undetectable above 20 keV around 2016 September 30, undetectable until around 2016 mid-November, soft energy band observation on 2016-09-24, non-detection on 2016-10-23, 2016-10-28, and 2016-11-01, hard state observation on 2009-09-10

Telescope: Swift BAT, INTEGRAL ISGRI, Swift XRT
